sections.section_instructions:

Which paragraph contains the following information?

Write the correct letter, A-K, in boxes 28-34 on your answer sheet.

questions.question_text: Similarities between pterosaurs and mechanical flight
The identification of the type of creature a pterosaur actually was
Conflicting theories about how pterosaurs came to fly
The cause of widespread destruction of animal life on our planet
The fact that pterosaurs once existed all over the world
The first clear proof that pterosaurs could fly
